trans-unit.source: You can find this sample in the tutorial project: Menu → Editor properties
trans-unit.target: You can find this sample in the tutorial project: Menu → Editor properties

trans-unit.source: This C# Beginner tutorial covers how to expose editor properties for Stride Game Studio.
trans-unit.target: This C# Beginner tutorial covers how to expose editor properties for Stride Game Studio.

trans-unit.source: By creating a public variable at the top of our script, we can create editor properties. Some of the most common properties are demonstrated. We can also create public variables that are not shown in the editor.
trans-unit.target: By creating a public variable at the top of our script, we can create editor properties. Some of the most common properties are demonstrated. We can also create public variables that are not shown in the editor.

trans-unit.source: The code above will result in the following properties inside Stride game studio.
trans-unit.target: The code above will result in the following properties inside Stride game studio.
